step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your arm straight overhead and feel the stretch. Ensure your shoulder is stable.
Excellent! Maintain that straight arm overhead. Focus on keeping your elbow from bending too much.
Great job opening your hand wide. Make sure your fingers are spread apart to maximize the stretch.
Well done making a fist and tightening your muscles. Remember to inhale during this action.
Second rep, looking good! Continue to keep that arm extended overhead and feel the resistance.
Good. Try to keep the elbow straighter as you extend your arm overhead.
Nicely done opening your hand wide again. Keep those fingers spread!
Fantastic! You're making a strong fist and tightening your muscles. Remember to exhale as you relax.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Overhead Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and open your hand wide. Make a tight fist while inhaling, and relax while exhaling to help pump lymph fluid.
